alert.note: Alert for Burns BLM; Vale BLM (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 24 at 1:12PM PDT until July 24 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THIS EVENING AND TOMORROW AFTERNOON... .Gusty southwest winds will increase across Southwest Idaho and Southeast Oregon, especially near the Nevada border and on ridgetops, during the afternoon and evening hours with very low relative humidity. This will result in critical fire weather conditions. The strongest winds will arrive this afternoon and evening ahead of a cold front. After the cold front passage this evening, winds will decrease substantially on Tuesday in southeast Oregon but will remain elevated in southwest Idaho especially near the ID-NV border in zones 426 and 423. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT /8 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR BURNS BLM AND VALE BLM...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 636 AND 637... * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values of 7 to 15 percent.
